section.heading: Publication of regulations; effective date.
section.text: The regulations provided for in § 1-303.01 and adopted prior to October 21, 1968, shall be printed in 1 or more of the daily newspapers published in the District of Columbia; and no penalty prescribed for the violation of said regulations shall be enforced until 30 days after such publication.

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Publication of laws and ordinances, see § 5-103.01.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in § 1-303.01 and § 1-303.03.
